commit.message:
genautomata.c (output_max_insn_queue_index_def): Take latencies into account.

2002-07-05  Vladimir Makarov  <vmakarov@redhat.com>

	* genautomata.c (output_max_insn_queue_index_def): Take latencies
	into account.

From-SVN: r55269
